if sect = "policy statement" then pagetitle="Policy Statement"
if sect = "academic regulations" then pagetitle="Academic Regulations"
Welcome to Leeds Trinity and All Saints.

Our aim in compiling this handbook is to provide you with a user-friendly guide to our College services, facilities and administration, as well as something that we hope will answer any questions you may have.
You are unlikely to need all the information immediately but you may well need to refer to it at a later date. Please be sure, therefore, to bookmark this site.
We hope you all have a happy and successful year here.
